YUM 40 SSW EED 25 NNW EED 30 NW IGM 55 NE IGM 25 NW FLG SOW 45 SSE
SOW 40 N SAD SAD 35 NNE FHU 50 WSW FHU.

THERE IS A MRGL RISK OF SVR TSTMS TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 15 ESE
ORF 40 S ECG 15 NE OAJ FAY 40 ESE CLT HKY 20 NNW HKY PSK SHD 25 SSE
MRB 15 W BWI 25 ENE BWI 15 S DOV 20 ESE SBY 15 ESE ORF.

GEN TSTMS ARE FCST TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 55 NNW MOT 45 WNW DIK
